SEARCH

Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

Klasse
Beschreibung
App
The main application class that initializes the mouse and window event handlers, sets the GUI look and feel, and starts the application.
ChemicalElement
Elements class contains static instances of ChemicalElement representing the first 20 elements of the periodic table, along with their properties.
Elements
Elements class contains static instances of ChemicalElement representing the first 20 elements of the periodic table, along with their properties.
ElementWindow
ElementWindow is a JFrame that displays detailed information about a specific chemical element.
FixElementWindow
FixElementWindow is an interface that represents a window displaying information about a specific chemical element in the periodic table.
MemoryMonitor
MemoryMonitor is a utility class that monitors the Java Virtual Machine's (JVM) memory usage.
MenuWindow
MenuWindow is a JFrame that provides a user interface for selecting light and dark modes, as well as a language selection dropdown.
MouseController
MouseController is an interface that defines methods for handling mouse events in the application.
MouseEventHandler
MouseEventHandler is a service class that implements MouseController to handle mouse events for the application.
PeriodicTable
PeriodicTable is a utility class that provides methods to retrieve information about the periodic table of elements, including element colors and their arrangement.
PSE
PSE (Periodicsystem of Elements) is a JFrame that displays the periodic table of elements.
SQLHandler
SQLHandler is a service that manages SQLite database operations.
WindowController
WindowController is an interface that defines methods for managing window events in the application.
WindowEventHandler
WindowEventHandler is a service that manages window events in the application.
